@[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="1af5afb1-f282-4a31-9e2f-406af9118334" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="112" class="">Absolutely  heres a fun and competitive format that blends your group's rounds with the real PGA Championship:</p>
<hr data-start="114" data-end="117" class="">
<h2 data-start="119" data-end="182" class=""><strong data-start="122" data-end="182">Bachelor Party Golf x PGA Championship Tournament Format</strong></h2>
<h3 data-start="184" data-end="205" class=""><strong data-start="188" data-end="205">Participants:</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="206" data-end="283">
<li data-start="206" data-end="245" class="">
<p data-start="208" data-end="245" class="">8 players (split into two teams of 4)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="246" data-end="283" class="">
<p data-start="248" data-end="283" class="">8 PGA pros drafted (1 per bachelor)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="285" data-end="288" class="">
<h2 data-start="290" data-end="322" class=""><strong data-start="293" data-end="322">Step 1: Draft PGA Players</strong></h2>
<ul data-start="323" data-end="544">
<li data-start="323" data-end="365" class="">
<p data-start="325" data-end="365" class=""><strong data-start="325" data-end="340">Snake draft</strong> style on Thursday night.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="366" data-end="467" class="">
<p data-start="368" data-end="467" class="">Each person drafts <strong data-start="387" data-end="404">2 PGA players</strong> from the PGA Championship field (total of 16 drafted players).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="468" data-end="544" class="">
<p data-start="470" data-end="544" class="">Youll use <strong data-start="481" data-end="512">one of your two PGA players</strong> as your <strong data-start="521" data-end="534">Partner</strong> each day.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="546" data-end="549" class="">
<h2 data-start="551" data-end="589" class=""><strong data-start="554" data-end="589">Step 2: Weekend Format Overview</strong></h2>
<h3 data-start="591" data-end="637" class=""><strong data-start="595" data-end="637">Friday &amp; Saturday  Daily Competitions</strong></h3>
<p data-start="638" data-end="656" class="">Each day includes:</p>
<ul data-start="657" data-end="779">
<li data-start="657" data-end="715" class="">
<p data-start="659" data-end="715" class=""><strong data-start="659" data-end="685">Your own 18-hole score</strong> (net or gross  your choice).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="716" data-end="779" class="">
<p data-start="718" data-end="779" class=""><strong data-start="718" data-end="746">Your PGA partners score</strong> (from their PGA round that day).</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="781" data-end="841" class=""><strong data-start="781" data-end="841">Your Daily Score = Your Golf Score + PGA Partners Score</strong></p>
<ul data-start="842" data-end="1034">
<li data-start="842" data-end="922" class="">
<p data-start="844" data-end="922" class="">Normalize PGA scores to your courses par (e.g., -2 = 70 if course par is 72).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="923" data-end="1034" class="">
<p data-start="925" data-end="933" class="">Example:</p>
<ul data-start="936" data-end="1034">
<li data-start="936" data-end="951" class="">
<p data-start="938" data-end="951" class="">You shoot 85.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="954" data-end="993" class="">
<p data-start="956" data-end="993" class="">Your partner shoots -1 that day = 71.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="996" data-end="1034" class="">
<p data-start="998" data-end="1034" class=""><strong data-start="998" data-end="1034">Your total score = 85 + 71 = 156</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1036" data-end="1039" class="">
<h2 data-start="1041" data-end="1074" class=""><strong data-start="1044" data-end="1074">Step 3: Individual Scoring</strong></h2>
<ul data-start="1076" data-end="1260">
<li data-start="1076" data-end="1153" class="">
<p data-start="1078" data-end="1153" class=""><strong data-start="1078" data-end="1113">Cumulative score over both days</strong> wins the <strong data-start="1123" data-end="1146">Individual Champion</strong> title.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1154" data-end="1260" class="">
<p data-start="1156" data-end="1260" class="">You must choose <strong data-start="1172" data-end="1199">one PGA partner per day</strong>  can be the same or different each day from your 2 drafted.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1262" data-end="1265" class="">
<h2 data-start="1267" data-end="1306" class=""><strong data-start="1270" data-end="1306">Step 4: Team Scoring (Team of 4)</strong></h2>
<ul data-start="1308" data-end="1490">
<li data-start="1308" data-end="1371" class="">
<p data-start="1310" data-end="1371" class="">2 teams of 4 (decided before Friday round or randomly drawn).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1372" data-end="1445" class="">
<p data-start="1374" data-end="1445" class=""><strong data-start="1374" data-end="1445">Add the daily total scores of the 3 best players per team each day.</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1446" data-end="1490" class="">
<p data-start="1448" data-end="1490" class="">Total across both days = <strong data-start="1473" data-end="1489">Winning Team</strong>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1492" data-end="1495" class="">
<h2 data-start="1497" data-end="1516" class=""><strong data-start="1500" data-end="1516">Tiebreakers:</strong></h2>
<ul data-start="1517" data-end="1628">
<li data-start="1517" data-end="1552" class="">
<p data-start="1519" data-end="1552" class="">Individual: Lower Saturday score.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1553" data-end="1628" class="">
<p data-start="1555" data-end="1628" class="">Team: 4th score counts on Saturday (the one that was dropped originally).</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1630" data-end="1633" class="">
<h2 data-start="1635" data-end="1654" class=""><strong data-start="1638" data-end="1654">Bonus Ideas:</strong></h2>
<ul data-start="1655" data-end="1786">
<li data-start="1655" data-end="1721" class="">
<p data-start="1657" data-end="1721" class="">Side pot for <strong data-start="1670" data-end="1700">best individual golf score</strong> (your actual round).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1722" data-end="1786" class="">
<p data-start="1724" data-end="1786" class="">Side pot for <strong data-start="1737" data-end="1764">best performing PGA pro</strong> among the 16 drafted.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1788" data-end="1791" class="">
<h2 data-start="1793" data-end="1832" class=""><strong data-start="1796" data-end="1832">Optional Scoring Simplification:</strong></h2>
<p data-start="1833" data-end="1850" class="">To keep it quick:</p>
<ul data-start="1851" data-end="2027">
<li data-start="1851" data-end="1938" class="">
<p data-start="1853" data-end="1938" class="">Just <strong data-start="1858" data-end="1907">add your score + your PGA partners raw score</strong> (not strokes relative to par).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1939" data-end="2027" class="">
<p data-start="1941" data-end="2027" class="">Or <strong data-start="1944" data-end="1973">award strokes gained/lost</strong> (e.g., you get -3 if your partner shot -3 under par).</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="2029" data-end="2032" class="">
<p data-start="2034" data-end="2120" class="">Let me know if you want this turned into a printable scorecard or shared Google Sheet!</p></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article><article class="text-token-text-primary w-full" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-3" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h5 class="sr-only">You said:</h5><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="user" data-message-id="fc25ebc3-33c5-411f-8c71-d684372f4679" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden items-end rtl:items-start"><div class="relative max-w-[var(--user-chat-width,70%)] bg-token-message-surface rounded-3xl px-5 py-2.5"><div class="whitespace-pre-wrap">Is a straight draft or Calcutta better? It might be hard to do either because today is Wednesday and PGA championship starts tomorrow morning Thursday, and we would have to all get available tonight to draft </div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article><article class="text-token-text-primary w-full" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-4" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="7fd31a51-54ba-46fa-9a28-826fb61b7d96" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="211" class="">Given the time crunch and logistics (8 guys, midweek availability, PGA starting Thursday morning), heres a quick comparison of <strong data-start="128" data-end="159">Straight Draft vs. Calcutta</strong>, and a third <strong data-start="173" data-end="190">hybrid option</strong> you might like best:</p>
<hr data-start="213" data-end="216" class="">
<h3 data-start="218" data-end="243" class=""><strong data-start="222" data-end="243">1. Straight Draft</strong></h3>
<p data-start="244" data-end="253" class=""><strong data-start="244" data-end="253">Pros:</strong></p>
<ul data-start="254" data-end="371">
<li data-start="254" data-end="275" class="">
<p data-start="256" data-end="275" class="">Easy to understand.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="276" data-end="324" class="">
<p data-start="278" data-end="324" class="">Everyone has clear ownership of 2 PGA players.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="325" data-end="371" class="">
<p data-start="327" data-end="371" class="">No betting involved (or optional side bets).</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="373" data-end="382" class=""><strong data-start="373" data-end="382">Cons:</strong></p>
<ul data-start="383" data-end="495">
<li data-start="383" data-end="434" class="">
<p data-start="385" data-end="434" class="">Needs everyone available before Thursday morning.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="435" data-end="495" class="">
<p data-start="437" data-end="495" class="">Snake drafts with 8 people can be slow unless coordinated.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="497" data-end="500" class="">
<h3 data-start="502" data-end="529" class=""><strong data-start="506" data-end="529">2. Calcutta Auction</strong></h3>
<p data-start="530" data-end="539" class=""><strong data-start="530" data-end="539">Pros:</strong></p>
<ul data-start="540" data-end="662">
<li data-start="540" data-end="605" class="">
<p data-start="542" data-end="605" class="">High energy, gambling-focused, great for a bachelor party vibe.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="606" data-end="662" class="">
<p data-start="608" data-end="662" class="">People can bid big on top players, small on longshots.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="664" data-end="673" class=""><strong data-start="664" data-end="673">Cons:</strong></p>
<ul data-start="674" data-end="847">
<li data-start="674" data-end="722" class="">
<p data-start="676" data-end="722" class="">Requires <strong data-start="685" data-end="721">all 8 guys to be present tonight</strong>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="723" data-end="782" class="">
<p data-start="725" data-end="782" class="">Needs someone to track bidding, payouts, and settle cash.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="783" data-end="847" class="">
<p data-start="785" data-end="847" class="">Can get chaotic if people arent familiar with Calcutta rules.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="849" data-end="852" class="">
<h3 data-start="854" data-end="938" class=""><strong data-start="858" data-end="938">3. Best Option: Pre-set Draft Pool + Random Assignment or Quick Pick Tonight</strong></h3>
<p data-start="939" data-end="959" class=""><strong data-start="939" data-end="959">Heres the move:</strong></p>
<h4 data-start="961" data-end="1021" class=""><strong data-start="966" data-end="1021">A) Create 8 "Player Pods" (pre-built by you today):</strong></h4>
<p data-start="1022" data-end="1086" class="">Each pod = 2 PGA players (1 top-tier + 1 mid/low-tier).<br>
Example:</p>
<ul data-start="1087" data-end="1241">
<li data-start="1087" data-end="1129" class="">
<p data-start="1089" data-end="1129" class="">Pod 1: Scottie Scheffler + Sepp Straka</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1130" data-end="1163" class="">
<p data-start="1132" data-end="1163" class="">Pod 2: Rory McIlroy + Tom Kim</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1164" data-end="1241" class="">
<p data-start="1166" data-end="1241" class="">Pod 3: Jon Rahm + Adam Hadwin<br data-start="1195" data-end="1198">
 and so on (based on odds/world rankings).</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h4 data-start="1243" data-end="1322" class=""><strong data-start="1248" data-end="1322">B) Do a <strong data-start="1258" data-end="1273">random draw</strong> tonight via text/FaceTime OR quick pick order:</strong></h4>
<ul data-start="1323" data-end="1436">
<li data-start="1323" data-end="1379" class="">
<p data-start="1325" data-end="1379" class="">Use a random number generator or write names on paper.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1380" data-end="1436" class="">
<p data-start="1382" data-end="1436" class="">Quick snake or randomized pick  takes 10 minutes max.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1438" data-end="1494" class=""><strong data-start="1438" data-end="1461">Each guy gets a pod</strong> = 2 PGA players for the weekend.</p>
<h4 data-start="1496" data-end="1545" class=""><strong data-start="1501" data-end="1545">C) Then apply your original game format:</strong></h4>
<ul data-start="1546" data-end="1649">
<li data-start="1546" data-end="1597" class="">
<p data-start="1548" data-end="1597" class="">Each day, choose <strong data-start="1565" data-end="1582">1 PGA partner</strong> from your pod.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1598" data-end="1649" class="">
<p data-start="1600" data-end="1649" class="">Your golf score + their score = your daily total.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1651" data-end="1654" class="">
<p data-start="1656" data-end="1675" class="">This hybrid system:</p>
<ul data-start="1676" data-end="1812">
<li data-start="1676" data-end="1698" class="">
<p data-start="1678" data-end="1698" class="">Avoids a long draft.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1699" data-end="1712" class="">
<p data-start="1701" data-end="1712" class="">Feels fair.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1713" data-end="1737" class="">
<p data-start="1715" data-end="1737" class="">Keeps it fun and fast.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1738" data-end="1812" class="">
<p data-start="1740" data-end="1812" class="">Still gives each guy strategic choice (which PGA guy to use each round).</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1814" data-end="1817" class="">
<p data-start="1819" data-end="1940" class="">Want me to build you the 8 pods based on odds or world rankings? I can have them ready for you to send the group tonight.</p></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article><article class="text-token-text-primary w-full" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-5" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h5 class="sr-only">You said:</h5><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="user" data-message-id="781959ce-cc1e-42ae-983e-16a1ce653268" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden items-end rtl:items-start"><div class="relative max-w-[var(--user-chat-width,70%)] bg-token-message-surface rounded-3xl px-5 py-2.5"><div class="whitespace-pre-wrap">What if we give each of the 8 guys (5) golfers each, starting with the best odds to win given to the worst handicap and snaking down from there. 

Then we go in 2 somes and each player can pick one guy from their team to score with them on Friday and a different or same guy for Saturday. Then each player gets their net plus their PGA net and the lowest wins the individual championship for the 2 somes championship its just your actual golf scores best net over the 2 rounds. Then an added bonus is we can map out percentages for the top 10 at the end of the PGA championship. So first gets 25%, 2nd gets 17% etc etc. 

We can say $100 each in the pot for PGA leaderboard, $50 a guy to the winner of the individual, and $50 a guy to the winners of the 2some. 

Can you poke holes in this format, if any, and explain how we could fix it </div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article><article class="text-token-text-primary w-full" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-6" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="85953c1e-fe72-4394-af57-b6a92f035f6d" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="230" class="">This format is <strong data-start="15" data-end="50">smart, fun, and well-structured</strong>  especially for a last-minute bachelor party setup. Here's a breakdown of <strong data-start="126" data-end="146">what works great</strong>, <strong data-start="148" data-end="168">potential issues</strong>, and <strong data-start="174" data-end="229">small tweaks to make it airtight and easy to manage</strong>:</p>
<hr data-start="232" data-end="235" class="">
<h2 data-start="237" data-end="257" class=""><strong data-start="240" data-end="257">Format Recap:</strong></h2>
<h3 data-start="259" data-end="281" class=""><strong data-start="263" data-end="281">Draft &amp; Teams:</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="282" data-end="466">
<li data-start="282" data-end="332" class="">
<p data-start="284" data-end="332" class="">8 guys each get <strong data-start="300" data-end="317">5 PGA players</strong> (total of 40).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="333" data-end="404" class="">
<p data-start="335" data-end="404" class="">Draft is <strong data-start="344" data-end="370">reverse handicap order</strong>, snaked to reward weaker golfers.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="405" data-end="466" class="">
<p data-start="407" data-end="466" class="">Each guy picks <strong data-start="422" data-end="447">1 PGA partner per day</strong> (Friday/Saturday).</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="468" data-end="489" class=""><strong data-start="472" data-end="489">Competitions:</strong></h3>
<ol data-start="490" data-end="927">
<li data-start="490" data-end="630" class="">
<p data-start="493" data-end="521" class=""><strong data-start="493" data-end="521">Individual Championship:</strong></p>
<ul data-start="525" data-end="630">
<li data-start="525" data-end="597" class="">
<p data-start="527" data-end="597" class="">Player net score + PGA partners daily score (adjusted to net vs par).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="601" data-end="630" class="">
<p data-start="603" data-end="630" class="">Best 2-day cumulative wins.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="632" data-end="782" class="">
<p data-start="635" data-end="660" class=""><strong data-start="635" data-end="660">Twosome Championship:</strong></p>
<ul data-start="664" data-end="782">
<li data-start="664" data-end="703" class="">
<p data-start="666" data-end="703" class="">2-person golf teams (your groupings).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="707" data-end="782" class="">
<p data-start="709" data-end="782" class="">Best combined <strong data-start="723" data-end="766">net scores only from your actual rounds</strong> over both days.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="784" data-end="927" class="">
<p data-start="787" data-end="812" class=""><strong data-start="787" data-end="812">PGA Leaderboard Pool:</strong></p>
<ul data-start="816" data-end="927">
<li data-start="816" data-end="851" class="">
<p data-start="818" data-end="851" class="">$100 entry per person = $800 pot.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="855" data-end="927" class="">
<p data-start="857" data-end="927" class="">Payout split by how your 5 PGA players finish on the real leaderboard.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="929" data-end="932" class="">
<h2 data-start="934" data-end="954" class=""><strong data-start="937" data-end="954">Whats Great:</strong></h2>
<ul data-start="955" data-end="1225">
<li data-start="955" data-end="1009" class="">
<p data-start="957" data-end="1009" class=""><strong data-start="957" data-end="1009">Handicap-based draft order = fair and strategic.</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1010" data-end="1074" class="">
<p data-start="1012" data-end="1074" class="">Each guy having 5 golfers = <strong data-start="1040" data-end="1073">more sweat across the weekend</strong>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1075" data-end="1129" class="">
<p data-start="1077" data-end="1129" class="">You play your own ball + pick a pro for added drama.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1130" data-end="1225" class="">
<p data-start="1132" data-end="1225" class="">Payouts reward real golf, fake partner golf, and real PGA results = <strong data-start="1200" data-end="1224">balanced competition</strong>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1227" data-end="1230" class="">
<h2 data-start="1232" data-end="1279" class=""><strong data-start="1235" data-end="1279">Potential Holes (and How to Patch Them):</strong></h2>
<h3 data-start="1281" data-end="1332" class="">1. <strong data-start="1288" data-end="1332">Unclear How to Score PGA Partners Round</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="1333" data-end="1406">
<li data-start="1333" data-end="1406" class="">
<p data-start="1335" data-end="1406" class="">Are you adding their raw score? Relative to par? Adjusted as net score?</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1408" data-end="1585" class=""><strong data-start="1408" data-end="1416">Fix:</strong><br data-start="1416" data-end="1419">
Use <strong data-start="1423" data-end="1442">relative to par</strong> for PGA scores (e.g., Rory shoots -2 = 70 = add 70 to your net score).<br data-start="1513" data-end="1516">
This keeps it fair and avoids confusion across different course pars.</p>
<hr data-start="1587" data-end="1590" class="">
<h3 data-start="1592" data-end="1630" class="">2. <strong data-start="1599" data-end="1630">PGA Players Missing the Cut</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="1631" data-end="1707">
<li data-start="1631" data-end="1707" class="">
<p data-start="1633" data-end="1707" class="">If your Friday partner misses the cut, theyll have <strong data-start="1685" data-end="1706">no Saturday score</strong>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1709" data-end="1742" class=""><strong data-start="1709" data-end="1717">Fix:</strong><br data-start="1717" data-end="1720">
Before the tournament:</p>
<ul data-start="1743" data-end="1927">
<li data-start="1743" data-end="1810" class="">
<p data-start="1745" data-end="1810" class=""><strong data-start="1745" data-end="1771">Label 1 backup PGA guy</strong> for Saturday (from your original 5).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1811" data-end="1927" class="">
<p data-start="1813" data-end="1927" class="">If both original picks miss the cut, your Saturday partner is +80 by default (or just DNF you from PGA scoring).</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1929" data-end="1932" class="">
<h3 data-start="1934" data-end="1973" class="">3. <strong data-start="1941" data-end="1973">PGA Leaderboard Payout Logic</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="1974" data-end="2069">
<li data-start="1974" data-end="2069" class="">
<p data-start="1976" data-end="2069" class="">You need a <strong data-start="1987" data-end="2016">clean, agreed-upon system</strong> to award payout shares based on finishing positions.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="2071" data-end="2119" class=""><strong data-start="2071" data-end="2079">Fix:</strong><br>
Use a <strong data-start="2086" data-end="2108">point-based system</strong> like this:</p>
<ul data-start="2120" data-end="2249">
<li data-start="2120" data-end="2136" class="">
<p data-start="2122" data-end="2136" class="">1st = 25 pts</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2137" data-end="2149" class="">
<p data-start="2139" data-end="2149" class="">2nd = 18</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2150" data-end="2162" class="">
<p data-start="2152" data-end="2162" class="">3rd = 15</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2163" data-end="2175" class="">
<p data-start="2165" data-end="2175" class="">4th = 12</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2176" data-end="2188" class="">
<p data-start="2178" data-end="2188" class="">5th = 10</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2189" data-end="2200" class="">
<p data-start="2191" data-end="2200" class="">6th = 8</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2201" data-end="2212" class="">
<p data-start="2203" data-end="2212" class="">7th = 6</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2213" data-end="2224" class="">
<p data-start="2215" data-end="2224" class="">8th = 4</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2225" data-end="2236" class="">
<p data-start="2227" data-end="2236" class="">9th = 2</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2237" data-end="2249" class="">
<p data-start="2239" data-end="2249" class="">10th = 1</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="2251" data-end="2404" class="">Each PGA golfer on your 5-man team that finishes top 10 earns those points.<br data-start="2326" data-end="2329">
Total up your points, and <strong data-start="2355" data-end="2403">split the $800 pool proportionally by points</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="2406" data-end="2409" class="">
<h3 data-start="2411" data-end="2442" class="">4. <strong data-start="2418" data-end="2442">Slow Draft Logistics</strong></h3>
<p data-start="2443" data-end="2515" class="">If you're worried about everyone being around tonight for a snake draft:</p>
<p data-start="2517" data-end="2525" class=""><strong data-start="2517" data-end="2525">Fix:</strong></p>
<ul data-start="2526" data-end="2687">
<li data-start="2526" data-end="2589" class="">
<p data-start="2528" data-end="2589" class="">You (or a neutral party) pre-rank top 40 PGA players by odds.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2590" data-end="2687" class="">
<p data-start="2592" data-end="2687" class="">Run the snake draft <strong data-start="2612" data-end="2631">via text thread</strong> using reverse handicap order (takes 1015 minutes max).</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="2689" data-end="2692" class="">
<h2 data-start="2694" data-end="2732" class=""><strong data-start="2697" data-end="2732">Final Suggested Payout Summary:</strong></h2>
<div class="_tableContainer_16hzy_1"><div tabindex="-1" class="_tableWrapper_16hzy_14 group flex w-fit flex-col-reverse"><table data-start="2734" data-end="2996" class="w-fit <hr data-start="2998" data-end="3001" class="">
<p data-start="3003" data-end="3024" class="">Want help generating:</p>
<ul data-start="3025" data-end="3150">
<li data-start="3025" data-end="3066" class="">
<p data-start="3027" data-end="3066" class="">Top 40 PGA pros (ranked by Vegas odds)?</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3067" data-end="3112" class="">
<p data-start="3069" data-end="3112" class="">A Google Sheet to track scores and payouts?</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3113" data-end="3150" class="">
<p data-start="3115" data-end="3150" class="">A printable scorecard for each guy?</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="3152" data-end="3194" class="">Let me know  I can prep all that tonight.</p></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article><article class="text-token-text-primary w-full" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-7" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h5 class="sr-only">You said:</h5><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="user" data-message-id="f59b3797-ea69-4172-a87b-b5087f0099c7" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden items-end rtl:items-start"><div class="relative max-w-[var(--user-chat-width,70%)] bg-token-message-surface rounded-3xl px-5 py-2.5"><div class="whitespace-pre-wrap">Yes please- and would it be smarter to do more than 5 guys each player? </div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article><article class="text-token-text-primary w-full" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-8" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="7610d977-306a-4810-9419-39b881d69807" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="82" class="">Yes  giving each guy <strong data-start="22" data-end="69">more than 5 PGA players (e.g., 6 or even 7)</strong> can make it:</p>
<h3 data-start="84" data-end="135" class=""><strong data-start="88" data-end="121">Smarter, Fairer, and More Fun</strong>  here's why:</h3>
<hr data-start="137" data-end="140" class="">
<h3 data-start="142" data-end="185" class=""><strong data-start="146" data-end="185">Why 67 PGA Players Each Is Better:</strong></h3>
<ol data-start="187" data-end="766">
<li data-start="187" data-end="401" class="">
<p data-start="190" data-end="224" class=""><strong data-start="190" data-end="222">Cushions Against Missed Cuts</strong></p>
<ul data-start="228" data-end="401">
<li data-start="228" data-end="290" class="">
<p data-start="230" data-end="290" class="">With 5 players, youre likely to lose 12 to the cut line.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="294" data-end="401" class="">
<p data-start="296" data-end="401" class="">With 67, you still have multiple live players for Saturday, which keeps the weekend fun and competitive.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="403" data-end="617" class="">
<p data-start="406" data-end="447" class=""><strong data-start="406" data-end="445">Increases Top-10 Sweat for PGA Pool</strong></p>
<ul data-start="451" data-end="617">
<li data-start="451" data-end="527" class="">
<p data-start="453" data-end="527" class="">More players = better chance one of your guys sneaks into a payout spot.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="531" data-end="617" class="">
<p data-start="533" data-end="617" class="">Prevents a situation where one guy dominates just because he drafted Scottie + Rory.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="619" data-end="766" class="">
<p data-start="622" data-end="653" class=""><strong data-start="622" data-end="651">Makes Drafting Less Stale</strong></p>
<ul data-start="657" data-end="766">
<li data-start="657" data-end="766" class="">
<p data-start="659" data-end="766" class="">More golfers = deeper strategy. You might have to pick a guy outside the top 40, which adds fun volatility.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="768" data-end="771" class="">
<h3 data-start="773" data-end="822" class=""><strong data-start="777" data-end="822">How Many Total Players Should Be Drafted?</strong></h3>
<p data-start="824" data-end="834" class="">If you do:</p>
<ul data-start="835" data-end="910">
<li data-start="835" data-end="872" class="">
<p data-start="837" data-end="872" class=""><strong data-start="837" data-end="872">6 players x 8 guys = 48 golfers</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="873" data-end="910" class="">
<p data-start="875" data-end="910" class=""><strong data-start="875" data-end="910">7 players x 8 guys = 56 golfers</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="912" data-end="1053" class="">Thats still manageable and leaves <strong data-start="947" data-end="977">plenty of live PGA players</strong> unpicked (great if you want to allow optional waiver pickups or side bets).</p>
<hr data-start="1055" data-end="1058" class="">
<h3 data-start="1060" data-end="1119" class=""><strong data-start="1064" data-end="1117">Recommendation: Go With 6 Players Each (48 total)</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="1120" data-end="1256">
<li data-start="1120" data-end="1182" class="">
<p data-start="1122" data-end="1182" class="">It balances enough coverage without overwhelming your draft.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1183" data-end="1210" class="">
<p data-start="1185" data-end="1210" class="">Keeps rounds moving fast.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1211" data-end="1256" class="">
<p data-start="1213" data-end="1256" class="">Makes the PGA payout pool more competitive.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1258" data-end="1261" class="">
<h2 data-start="1263" data-end="1301" class=""><strong data-start="1266" data-end="1301">Next Steps (Ill prep for you):</strong></h2>
<ol data-start="1303" data-end="1714">
<li data-start="1303" data-end="1412" class="">
<p data-start="1306" data-end="1367" class=""><strong data-start="1306" data-end="1365">Top 48 PGA Championship golfers (based on current odds)</strong></p>
<ul data-start="1371" data-end="1412">
<li data-start="1371" data-end="1412" class="">
<p data-start="1373" data-end="1412" class="">Ill build this out into a draft sheet.</p>
</li>

</li>

<ul data-start="1438" data-end="1550">

<ul data-start="1584" data-end="1714">

<li data-start="1607" data-end="1623" class="">
<p data-start="1609" data-end="1623" class="">Your net score</p>
</li>

<p data-start="1631" data-end="1658" class="">PGA partner choice each day</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1664" data-end="1680" class="">
<p data-start="1666" data-end="1680" class="">Running totals</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1686" data-end="1714" class="">
<p data-start="1688" data-end="1714" class="">Team name for 2v2 pairings</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="1716" data-end="1719" class="">
<p data-start="1721" data-end="1744" class=""><strong data-start="1721" data-end="1744">Quick confirmation:</strong></p>
<ul data-start="1745" data-end="1987">
<li data-start="1745" data-end="1789" class="">
<p data-start="1747" data-end="1789" class="">Want to go with <strong data-start="1763" data-end="1788">6 PGA players per guy</strong>?</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1790" data-end="1870" class="">
<p data-start="1792" data-end="1870" class="">Are your twosomes already paired or do you want help randomly assigning teams?</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1871" data-end="1987" class="">
<p data-start="1873" data-end="1892" class="">Want payouts to be:</p>
<ul data-start="1895" data-end="1987">
<li data-start="1895" data-end="1919" class="">
<p data-start="1897" data-end="1919" class="">$800 = PGA leaderboard</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1922" data-end="1947" class="">
<p data-start="1924" data-end="1947" class="">$400 = individual champ</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1950" data-end="1987" class="">
<p data-start="1952" data-end="1987" class="">$400 = best twosome (net golf only)</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1989" data-end="2047" class="">Once you confirm, Ill build the files and send them over.</p></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article><article class="text-token-text-primary w-full" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-9" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h5 class="sr-only">You said:</h5><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 break-words dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="46" class="">Perfect  thats the <strong data-start="21" data-end="38">smartest move</strong> of all.</p>
<p data-start="48" data-end="126" class="">By <strong data-start="51" data-end="125">letting everyone pick their PGA partner for Saturday <em data-start="108" data-end="123">after the cut</em></strong>:</p>
<ul data-start="127" data-end="299">
<li data-start="127" data-end="182" class="">
<p data-start="129" data-end="182" class="">You <strong data-start="133" data-end="146">guarantee</strong> theyll have a live score to count.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="183" data-end="263" class="">
<p data-start="185" data-end="263" class="">It adds fun strategy: who do you trust to go low on Saturday from your roster?</p>
</li>
<li data-start="264" data-end="299" class="">
<p data-start="266" data-end="299" class="">No need for backups or DNF rules.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="301" data-end="304" class="">
<h2 data-start="306" data-end="362" class=""><strong data-start="309" data-end="362">Confirmed Format Summary: (Updated with Your Fix)</strong></h2>
<h3 data-start="364" data-end="378" class=""><strong data-start="368" data-end="378">Draft:</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="379" data-end="518">
<li data-start="379" data-end="430" class="">
<p data-start="381" data-end="430" class="">8 players each get <strong data-start="400" data-end="430">6 PGA Championship golfers</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="431" data-end="475" class="">
<p data-start="433" data-end="475" class="">Draft is <strong data-start="442" data-end="462">reverse handicap</strong>, snake style</p>
</li>
<li data-start="476" data-end="518" class="">
<p data-start="478" data-end="518" class="">Use <strong data-start="482" data-end="500">top 48 players</strong> from betting odds</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="520" data-end="565" class=""><strong data-start="524" data-end="565">Your Golf Rounds (Friday + Saturday):</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="566" data-end="845">
<li data-start="566" data-end="726" class="">
<p data-start="568" data-end="619" class="">Each day, pick <strong data-start="583" data-end="604">one PGA partner</strong> from your team</p>
<ul data-start="622" data-end="726">
<li data-start="622" data-end="675" class="">
<p data-start="624" data-end="675" class=""><strong data-start="624" data-end="634">Friday</strong> partner must be picked before your round</p>
</li>
<li data-start="678" data-end="726" class="">
<p data-start="680" data-end="726" class=""><strong data-start="680" data-end="692">Saturday</strong> partner is chosen <em data-start="711" data-end="726">after the cut</em></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="727" data-end="788" class="">
<p data-start="729" data-end="788" class="">Your <strong data-start="734" data-end="774">net score + your partners raw score</strong> = daily total</p>
</li>
<li data-start="789" data-end="845" class="">
<p data-start="791" data-end="845" class=""><strong data-start="791" data-end="845">Cumulative score over both days = Individual Champ</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="847" data-end="876" class=""><strong data-start="851" data-end="876">Twosome Championship:</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="877" data-end="1013">
<li data-start="877" data-end="961" class="">
<p data-start="879" data-end="961" class="">Each twosome plays best ball for fun, but <strong data-start="921" data-end="946">each guys net scores</strong> added together</p>
</li>
<li data-start="962" data-end="1013" class="">
<p data-start="964" data-end="1013" class="">Lowest <strong data-start="971" data-end="1013">combined net total over both days wins</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="1015" data-end="1044" class=""><strong data-start="1019" data-end="1044">PGA Leaderboard Pool:</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="1045" data-end="1355">
<li data-start="1045" data-end="1131" class="">
<p data-start="1047" data-end="1131" class="">Your 6 players can earn points for finishing <strong data-start="1092" data-end="1131">top 10 in the real PGA Championship</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1132" data-end="1294" class="">
<p data-start="1134" data-end="1148" class="">Points system:</p>
<ul data-start="1151" data-end="1294">
<li data-start="1151" data-end="1163" class="">
<p data-start="1153" data-end="1163" class="">1st = 25</p>
</li>

</li>

</li>
<li data-start="1196" data-end="1208" class="">

</li>

</li>
<li data-start="1240" data-end="1251" class="">

</li>
<li data-start="1254" data-end="1265" class="">

<p data-start="1373" data-end="1438" class="">Want me to build all of this into a shared <strong data-start="1416" data-end="1432">Google Sheet</strong> with:</p>
<ul data-start="1439" data-end="1539">
<li data-start="1439" data-end="1451" class="">
<p data-start="1441" data-end="1451" class="">Draft grid</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1452" data-end="1467" class="">
<p data-start="1454" data-end="1467" class="">Point tracker</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1468" data-end="1503" class="">
<p data-start="1470" data-end="1503" class="">Individual &amp; twosome scoring tabs</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1504" data-end="1539" class="">
<p data-start="1506" data-end="1539" class="">Auto-calculated payout summaries?</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1541" data-end="1586" class="">Just say the word and Ill drop you the link.</p></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article><article class="text-token-text-primary w-full" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-13" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h5 class="sr-only">You said:</h5><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="user" data-message-id="60b17255-3967-4549-ae14-02a08f1f73e5" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden items-end rtl:items-start"><div class="relative max-w-[var(--user-chat-width,70%)] bg-token-message-surface rounded-3xl px-5 py-2.5"><div class="whitespace-pre-wrap">Is this a fair weigh out? Or should we make the bottom higher %? In case no one cracks the top 10 from someones team </div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article><article class="text-token-text-primary w-full" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-14" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="f24599f2-b15c-486c-b5b7-278907157137" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="152" class="">Great question  and yes, <strong data-start="26" data-end="67">youre right to question the fairness</strong> of the current PGA payout distribution. Heres the issue with the current structure:</p>
<h3 data-start="154" data-end="170" class=""><strong data-start="158" data-end="170">Problem:</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="171" data-end="437">
<li data-start="171" data-end="384" class="">
<p data-start="173" data-end="227" class=""><strong data-start="173" data-end="220">Heavy top-end weighting (25 points for 1st)</strong> means:</p>
<ul data-start="230" data-end="384">
<li data-start="230" data-end="286" class="">
<p data-start="232" data-end="286" class="">One guy can scoop a huge payout if he hits the winner.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="289" data-end="384" class="">
<p data-start="291" data-end="384" class="">Several guys may walk away with $0, especially if they have only mid-finishers or no top-10s.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="385" data-end="437" class="">
<p data-start="387" data-end="437" class="">This makes it <strong data-start="401" data-end="436">less fun for 67 guys by Sunday</strong>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="439" data-end="442" class="">
<h2 data-start="444" data-end="475" class=""><strong data-start="447" data-end="475">Two Better Alternatives:</strong></h2>
<hr data-start="477" data-end="480" class="">
<h3 data-start="482" data-end="540" class=""><strong data-start="486" data-end="538">Option A: Weighted by Finish (But More Balanced)</strong></h3>
<p data-start="541" data-end="564" class=""><strong data-start="541" data-end="562">New Point System:</strong></p>
<ul data-start="565" data-end="775">
<li data-start="565" data-end="577" class="">
<p data-start="567" data-end="577" class="">1st = 20</p>
</li>
<li data-start="578" data-end="590" class="">
<p data-start="580" data-end="590" class="">2nd = 16</p>
</li>
<li data-start="591" data-end="603" class="">
<p data-start="593" data-end="603" class="">3rd = 13</p>
</li>
<li data-start="604" data-end="616" class="">
<p data-start="606" data-end="616" class="">4th = 11</p>
</li>
<li data-start="617" data-end="628" class="">
<p data-start="619" data-end="628" class="">5th = 9</p>
</li>
<li data-start="629" data-end="640" class="">
<p data-start="631" data-end="640" class="">6th = 7</p>
</li>
<li data-start="641" data-end="652" class="">
<p data-start="643" data-end="652" class="">7th = 5</p>
</li>
<li data-start="653" data-end="664" class="">
<p data-start="655" data-end="664" class="">8th = 4</p>
</li>
<li data-start="665" data-end="676" class="">
<p data-start="667" data-end="676" class="">9th = 3</p>
</li>
<li data-start="677" data-end="689" class="">
<p data-start="679" data-end="689" class="">10th = 2</p>
</li>
<li data-start="690" data-end="775" class="">
<p data-start="692" data-end="775" class="">Everyone who has <strong data-start="709" data-end="753">at least one player finish T21 or better</strong> gets <strong data-start="759" data-end="775">1 pity point</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="777" data-end="796" class=""><strong data-start="777" data-end="796">Why this works:</strong></p>
<ul data-start="797" data-end="909">
<li data-start="797" data-end="844" class="">
<p data-start="799" data-end="844" class="">Smoother drop-off, but still rewards winners.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="845" data-end="909" class="">
<p data-start="847" data-end="909" class="">Adds incentive for owning players that hang around the top 20.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="911" data-end="914" class="">
<h3 data-start="916" data-end="984" class=""><strong data-start="920" data-end="984">Option B: Guaranteed Payout Per Team (Best for Fun &amp; Fair)</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="986" data-end="1258">
<li data-start="986" data-end="1138" class="">
<p data-start="988" data-end="1138" class="">Each of the 8 guys gets <strong data-start="1012" data-end="1050">a fixed percentage of the PGA pool</strong> based on their <strong data-start="1066" data-end="1112">total combined earnings of their 6 golfers</strong> (actual PGA purse money).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1139" data-end="1258" class="">
<p data-start="1141" data-end="1258" class="">Use the PGAs final leaderboard and official earnings  just add up each teams total prize money from their players.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1260" data-end="1300" class=""><strong data-start="1260" data-end="1300">Payout example (top-heavy but fair):</strong></p>
<div class="_tableContainer_16hzy_1"><div tabindex="-1" class="_tableWrapper_16hzy_14 group flex w-fit flex-col-reverse"><table data-start="1302" data-end="1532" class="w-fit class="absolute end-0 flex items-end" style="height: 33px;"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="bg-token-bg-primary hover:bg-token-bg-tertiary text-token-text-secondary my-1 rounded-sm <p data-start="1534" data-end="1553" class=""><strong data-start="1534" data-end="1553">Why this works:</strong></p>
<ul data-start="1554" data-end="1677">
<li data-start="1554" data-end="1599" class="">
<p data-start="1556" data-end="1599" class=""><strong data-start="1556" data-end="1583">Everyone gets something</strong>, even if small.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1600" data-end="1637" class="">
<p data-start="1602" data-end="1637" class="">Big reward for smart picks or luck.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1638" data-end="1677" class="">
<p data-start="1640" data-end="1677" class="">Zero ties, since earnings are unique.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1679" data-end="1682" class="">
<h3 data-start="1684" data-end="1707" class=""><strong data-start="1688" data-end="1707">Recommendation:</strong></h3>
<p data-start="1708" data-end="1896" class="">Go with <strong data-start="1716" data-end="1728">Option B</strong>  payout based on <strong data-start="1747" data-end="1793">total prize money earned by your team of 6</strong>.<br data-start="1794" data-end="1797">
Its objective, tracks live throughout the weekend, and still makes Sunday exciting for all 8 guys.</p>
<p data-start="1898" data-end="1983" class="">Want me to build that into your scoring sheet with live leaderboard link + auto calc?</p></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article><article class="text-token-text-primary w-full" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-15" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h5 class="sr-only">You said:</h5><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="user" data-message-id="a9297403-3fa8-4137-b50d-ab272209c128" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden items-end rtl:items-start"><div class="relative max-w-[var(--user-chat-width,70%)] bg-token-message-surface rounded-3xl px-5 py-2.5"><div class="whitespace-pre-wrap">Do you know my 8 guys handicaps?

<ul data-start="424" data-end="530">
<li data-start="424" data-end="439" class="">

</li>

</li>
<li data-start="490" data-end="504" class="">
<p data-start="492" data-end="504" class="">High teens</p>
</li>
<li data-start="505" data-end="530" class="">
<p data-start="507" data-end="530" class="">20+ or bogey golfer</p>
</li>
</ul>

<h3 data-start="2237" data-end="2258" class=""> <strong data-start="2244" data-end="2258">Next Steps</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="2260" data-end="2814">
<li data-start="2260" data-end="2370" class="">
<p data-start="2262" data-end="2370" class=""><strong data-start="2262" data-end="2277">Draft Order</strong>: Based on the handicaps provided earlier, we'll proceed with a reverse handicap snake draft.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2371" data-end="2486" class="">
<p data-start="2373" data-end="2486" class=""><strong data-start="2373" data-end="2387">Draft Grid</strong>: I'll create a Google Sheet with the draft grid, allowing each participant to fill in their picks.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2487" data-end="2646" class="">
<p data-start="2489" data-end="2646" class=""><strong data-start="2489" data-end="2506">Scoring Sheet</strong>: The same sheet will include tabs for individual and twosome scoring, as well as a PGA points tracker based on final leaderboard positions.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2647" data-end="2814" class="">
<p data-start="2649" data-end="2814" class=""><strong data-start="2649" data-end="2673">Printable Scorecards</strong>: I'll prepare individual scorecards for each participant, including their handicap and space to record daily scores and PGA partner choices.</p>
</li>

</li>
</ul>

</li>

</li>

<hr data-start="122" data-end="125" class="">
<h2 data-start="127" data-end="189" class=""><strong data-start="130" data-end="189">Final Format: PGA x Bachelor Party Tournament (Updated)</strong></h2>
<h3 data-start="191" data-end="232" class=""><strong data-start="195" data-end="232">1. PGA Pool  Ongoing (No Change)</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="233" data-end="489">
<li data-start="233" data-end="290" class="">
<p data-start="235" data-end="290" class="">Each of the 8 guys has 8 PGA players (already drafted).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="291" data-end="345" class="">
<p data-start="293" data-end="345" class=""><strong data-start="293" data-end="319">$100 buy-in per person</strong> = <strong data-start="322" data-end="345">$800 total PGA Pool</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="346" data-end="489" class="">
<p data-start="348" data-end="391" class="">Payouts based on final leaderboard results:</p>
<ul data-start="394" data-end="489">
<li data-start="394" data-end="426" class="">
<p data-start="396" data-end="426" class="">Either <strong data-start="403" data-end="426">top-10 point system</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="429" data-end="489" class="">
<p data-start="431" data-end="489" class="">Or <strong data-start="434" data-end="462">total prize money earned</strong> by your team (recommended)</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="491" data-end="494" class="">
<h3 data-start="496" data-end="557" class=""><strong data-start="500" data-end="557">2. Bachelor Party Golf Tournament (2-Man Team Format)</strong></h3>
<h3 data-start="559" data-end="582" class=""><strong data-start="563" data-end="582">Team Structure:</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="583" data-end="706">
<li data-start="583" data-end="611" class="">
<p data-start="585" data-end="611" class="">8 players  <strong data-start="597" data-end="611">4 twosomes</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="612" data-end="706" class="">
<p data-start="614" data-end="706" class="">You can pre-set or randomize teams (let me know if you want help balancing them by handicap)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="708" data-end="711" class="">
<h3 data-start="713" data-end="744" class=""><strong data-start="717" data-end="744">Scoring Format (Daily):</strong></h3>
<p data-start="745" data-end="778" class=""><strong data-start="745" data-end="778">Each day (Friday &amp; Saturday):</strong></p>
<ul data-start="779" data-end="986">
<li data-start="779" data-end="826" class="">
<p data-start="781" data-end="826" class="">Every player records their <strong data-start="808" data-end="826">net golf score</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="827" data-end="913" class="">
<p data-start="829" data-end="913" class="">Each player also chooses <strong data-start="854" data-end="894">1 PGA player from their 8-man roster</strong> as their partner</p>
</li>
<li data-start="914" data-end="986" class="">
<p data-start="916" data-end="986" class="">PGA partner's <strong data-start="930" data-end="959">raw score relative to par</strong> is added to your net score</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="988" data-end="1022" class=""><strong data-start="988" data-end="1022">Daily Net Score (per player) =</strong></p>
<blockquote data-start="1023" data-end="1088">
<p data-start="1025" data-end="1088" class="">Your Net Golf Score + PGA Partners PGA Score (adjusted to par)</p>
</blockquote>
<p data-start="1090" data-end="1174" class=""><strong data-start="1090" data-end="1174">Twosome Score = Combined net score for both players (with PGA partners included)</strong></p>
<hr data-start="1176" data-end="1179" class="">
<h3 data-start="1181" data-end="1209" class=""><strong data-start="1185" data-end="1209">Championship Winner:</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="1210" data-end="1321">
<li data-start="1210" data-end="1254" class="">
<p data-start="1212" data-end="1254" class="">Add <strong data-start="1216" data-end="1254">both days' scores for each twosome</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1255" data-end="1321" class="">
<p data-start="1257" data-end="1321" class="">Lowest <strong data-start="1264" data-end="1321">combined score wins the $400 Twosome Championship pot</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1323" data-end="1326" class="">
<h3 data-start="1328" data-end="1347" class=""><strong data-start="1332" data-end="1347">Side Notes:</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="1348" data-end="1572">
<li data-start="1348" data-end="1409" class="">
<p data-start="1350" data-end="1409" class="">PGA partner for <strong data-start="1366" data-end="1409">Friday must be picked before your round</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1410" data-end="1468" class="">
<p data-start="1412" data-end="1468" class="">PGA partner for <strong data-start="1428" data-end="1468">Saturday can be picked after the cut</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1469" data-end="1572" class="">
<p data-start="1471" data-end="1572" class="">If your chosen partner <strong data-start="1494" data-end="1512">misses the cut</strong>, you can still choose someone else from your remaining team</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1574" data-end="1577" class="">
<h3 data-start="1579" data-end="1620" class=""><strong data-start="1583" data-end="1620">Money Breakdown (Total = $1,600):</strong></h3>

<h2 data-start="56" data-end="116" class=""><strong data-start="59" data-end="116">Bachelor Party Golf Tournament Format (Final Version)</strong></h2>
<h3 data-start="118" data-end="147" class=""><strong data-start="122" data-end="147">1. PGA Pool  Ongoing</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="148" data-end="379">
<li data-start="148" data-end="205" class="">
<p data-start="150" data-end="205" class=""><strong data-start="150" data-end="183">Each person has 8 PGA players</strong> (drafted snake style)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="206" data-end="251" class="">
<p data-start="208" data-end="251" class="">$100 buy-in per person  <strong data-start="233" data-end="251">$800 total pot</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="252" data-end="379" class="">
<p data-start="254" data-end="379" class=""><strong data-start="254" data-end="298">Payout based on total prize money earned</strong> by your PGA roster<br data-start="317" data-end="320">
<em data-start="322" data-end="379">(or let me know if you prefer the top-10 points format)</em></p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="381" data-end="384" class="">
<h3 data-start="386" data-end="440" class=""><strong data-start="390" data-end="440">2. In-Person Tournament  Twosome Championship</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="441" data-end="839">
<li data-start="441" data-end="475" class="">
<p data-start="443" data-end="475" class="">4 teams of 2 (set or randomized)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="476" data-end="647" class="">
<p data-start="478" data-end="521" class=""><strong data-start="478" data-end="519">Scoring each day (Friday + Saturday):</strong></p>
<ul data-start="524" data-end="647">
<li data-start="524" data-end="594" class="">
<p data-start="526" data-end="594" class="">Players <strong data-start="535" data-end="548">net score</strong> + PGA partners <strong data-start="565" data-end="594">raw score relative to par</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="597" data-end="647" class="">
<p data-start="599" data-end="647" class="">Each twosome = sum of both players' daily totals</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="649" data-end="720" class="">
<p data-start="651" data-end="720" class=""><strong data-start="651" data-end="720">Twosome Total Score = (Friday Team Total) + (Saturday Team Total)</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="721" data-end="755" class="">
<p data-start="723" data-end="755" class=""><strong data-start="723" data-end="755">Lowest 2-day team total wins</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="756" data-end="800" class="">
<p data-start="758" data-end="800" class="">$50 buy-in per person  <strong data-start="782" data-end="800">$400 total pot</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="801" data-end="839" class="">
<p data-start="803" data-end="839" class=""><strong data-start="803" data-end="839">1 Winning Twosome takes all $400</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="841" data-end="844" class="">

<ul data-start="754" data-end="895">

<p data-start="756" data-end="831" class="">If one guy owns multiple top-10 finishers, he can rack up multiple payouts.</p>

<p data-start="668" data-end="769" class="">You get paid the amount listed <strong data-start="699" data-end="769">for each PGA player on your roster who finishes in that exact spot</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="770" data-end="919" class="">
<p data-start="772" data-end="882" class="">If one of your guys finishes <strong data-start="801" data-end="807">T3</strong>, and two players tie for 3rd, they split the <strong data-start="853" data-end="874">3rd + 4th payouts</strong> evenly:</p>
<ul data-start="885" data-end="919">
<li data-start="885" data-end="919" class="">
<p data-start="887" data-end="919" class="">($119 + $95)  2 = <strong data-start="906" data-end="919">$107 each</strong></p>

<p data-start="926" data-end="1049" class="">Let me know when you're ready to assign or randomize twosomes and Ill drop in the final scoring sheet and printable cards.</p></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article><article class="text-token-text-primary w-full" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-49" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h5 class="sr-only">You said:</h5><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="user" data-message-id="6486564e-7464-43ac-9bef-167f7376233a" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden items-end rtl:items-start"><div class="relative max-w-[var(--user-chat-width,70%)] bg-token-message-surface rounded-3xl px-5 py-2.5"><div class="whitespace-pre-wrap">Okay so the PGA format stays the same. 
$50/guy for Friday ($400 pot) 
$50/guy for Saturday ($400 pot) 
You cannot pick the same guy twice, and it is not a running total there is just a winning 2 some Friday and a winning 2 some Saturday. Also, one added thing, lets say one 2 some picks Scheffler and Xander, Scheffler shoots a 70 and Xander shoots a 74, lets just average those as a 72, and add it to the net total of the 2 golfers that picked those 2 pga guys for the net total Friday and net total saturday</div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article><article class="text-token-text-primary w-full" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-50" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex items-center"><div class="w-fit" type="button" aria-haspopup="dialog" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="radix-rgo" data-state="closed"><div style="width: 1px; Heres the <strong data-start="50" data-end="75">final format overview</strong> for your bachelor party golf tournament:</p>
<hr data-start="118" data-end="121" class="">
<h2 data-start="123" data-end="165" class=""><strong data-start="126" data-end="165">PGA Pool ($100/Person  $800 Total)</strong></h2>
<ul data-start="166" data-end="399">
<li data-start="166" data-end="201" class="">
<p data-start="168" data-end="201" class="">Each person drafted 8 PGA players</p>
</li>
<li data-start="202" data-end="255" class="">
<p data-start="204" data-end="255" class="">Payout based on final <strong data-start="226" data-end="255">top 10 leaderboard finish</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="256" data-end="319" class="">
<p data-start="258" data-end="319" class=""><strong data-start="258" data-end="282">Fixed payout amounts</strong> (e.g., 1st = $198, 2nd = $143, etc.)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="320" data-end="399" class="">
<p data-start="322" data-end="399" class="">You can win multiple payouts if more than one of your players finishes top 10</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="401" data-end="404" class="">
<h2 data-start="406" data-end="474" class=""><strong data-start="409" data-end="474">Daily Twosome Tournaments ($400 Each for Friday and Saturday)</strong></h2>
<ul data-start="475" data-end="637">
<li data-start="475" data-end="503" class="">
<p data-start="477" data-end="503" class=""><strong data-start="477" data-end="503">$50 per person per day</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="504" data-end="539" class="">
<p data-start="506" data-end="539" class="">Each day is <strong data-start="518" data-end="539">scored separately</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="540" data-end="584" class="">
<p data-start="542" data-end="584" class="">No running total  fresh contest both days</p>
</li>
<li data-start="585" data-end="637" class="">
<p data-start="587" data-end="637" class="">You <strong data-start="591" data-end="627">cannot pick the same PGA partner</strong> both days</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="639" data-end="671" class=""><strong data-start="643" data-end="671">Daily Scoring Breakdown:</strong></h3>
<ul data-start="672" data-end="912">
<li data-start="672" data-end="699" class="">
<p data-start="674" data-end="699" class="">Each golfer plays <strong data-start="692" data-end="699">net</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="700" data-end="764" class="">
<p data-start="702" data-end="764" class="">Each twosome selects <strong data-start="723" data-end="741">2 PGA partners</strong> from their own rosters</p>
</li>
<li data-start="765" data-end="838" class="">
<p data-start="767" data-end="838" class=""><strong data-start="767" data-end="790">PGA Score = Average</strong> of the 2 PGA players' scores (raw, no handicap)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="839" data-end="912" class="">
<p data-start="841" data-end="912" class=""><strong data-start="841" data-end="912">Team Total = Combined net golf scores of both players + PGA average</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<blockquote data-start="914" data-end="968">
<p data-start="916" data-end="968" class=""><strong data-start="916" data-end="968">Lowest total score wins the $400 pot for the day</strong></p>
</blockquote>
<hr data-start="970" data-end="973" class="">
<p data-start="975" data-end="1000" class="">Would you like me to now:</p>
<ol data-start="1001" data-end="1235" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">
<li data-start="1001" data-end="1051" class="">
<p data-start="1004" data-end="1051" class="">Randomly assign twosomes or take your pairings?</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1052" data-end="1235" class="">
<p data-start="1055" data-end="1090" class="">Deliver the final Google Sheet for:</p>
<ul data-start="1094" data-end="1235" data-is-last-node="">
<li data-start="1094" data-end="1120" class="">
<p data-start="1096" data-end="1120" class="">PGA leaderboard tracking</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1124" data-end="1188" class="">
<p data-start="1126" data-end="1188" class="">Friday + Saturday scoring (with automatic PGA score averaging)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1192" data-end="1235" class="">
<p data-start="1194" data-end="1235" class="">Auto-highlight daily winners and payouts?</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article><article class="text-token-text-primary w-full" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-51" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h5 class="sr-only">You said:</h5><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="user" data-message-id="d7d98c89-5421-4b18-8529-4cd318d42f02" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden items-end rtl:items-start"><div class="relative max-w-[var(--user-chat-width,70%)] bg-token-message-surface rounded-3xl px-5 py-2.5"><div class="whitespace-pre-wrap">Seaside:

@[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="d075fdfe-5bf2-4c86-b4fb-d1b7178f8b6e" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="37" class="">Yes  <strong data-start="6" data-end="36">you are absolutely correct</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="39" data-end="98" class="">If a players <strong data-start="53" data-end="91">course handicap is greater than 18</strong>, then:</p>
<ul data-start="100" data-end="261">
<li data-start="100" data-end="141" class="">
<p data-start="102" data-end="141" class="">They receive <strong data-start="115" data-end="141">1 stroke on every hole</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="142" data-end="261" class="">
<p data-start="144" data-end="261" class="">And an <strong data-start="151" data-end="193">additional stroke on the hardest holes</strong>, based on the stroke index (starting with handicap 1, then 2, etc.)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="263" data-end="266" class="">
<h3 data-start="268" data-end="295" class=""><strong data-start="272" data-end="295">How It Should Work:</strong></h3>
<p data-start="297" data-end="343" class="">Lets say someones <strong data-start="317" data-end="342">course handicap is 20</strong>:</p>
<ul data-start="344" data-end="453">
<li data-start="344" data-end="383" class="">
<p data-start="346" data-end="383" class="">They get <strong data-start="355" data-end="383">1 stroke on all 18 holes</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="384" data-end="453" class="">
<p data-start="386" data-end="453" class="">And <strong data-start="390" data-end="403">2 strokes</strong> on the <strong data-start="411" data-end="430">2 hardest holes</strong> (stroke index 1 and 2)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="455" data-end="499" class="">So their <strong data-start="464" data-end="484">black dot layout</strong> would include:</p>
<ul data-start="500" data-end="593">
<li data-start="500" data-end="530" class="">
<p data-start="502" data-end="530" class="">18 holes with at least 1 dot</p>
</li>
<li data-start="531" data-end="593" class="">
<p data-start="533" data-end="593" class="">2 holes with <strong data-start="546" data-end="561">double dots</strong> (or a different mark like "**")</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="595" data-end="598" class="">
<h3 data-start="600" data-end="613" class="">Ill now:</h3>
<ul data-start="614" data-end="763">
<li data-start="614" data-end="682" class="">
<p data-start="616" data-end="682" class="">Recalculate the dot layouts for players with course handicaps &gt; 18</p>
</li>
<li data-start="683" data-end="763" class="">
<p data-start="685" data-end="763" class="">Update the scorecards to show <strong data-start="715" data-end="720"></strong> (single stroke) and <strong data-start="741" data-end="747"></strong> (double stroke)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="765" data-end="798" class="">Generating the corrected PDF now.</p></div></div></div><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="48b2315f-759a-43cc-9de8-e871fd242aa3" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="73" class="">Here is your updated PDF with fully accurate <strong data-start="45" data-end="72">personalized scorecards</strong>:</p>

</li>
